name: Space Burger
description:
This is an X like space trading game where you can buy and sell items to get money.

Controls

Fly controls:

WASD: move spaceship

Q: roll spaceship left

E: roll spaceship right

Mouse move: rotate spaceship

Trading screen controls:

Left arrow: buy item

Right arrow: sell item

Up / Down arrow: select item

Enter: save game

B: Incrase inventory capacity for money

Alt + F4: Quit game

Credits

3D models:
cow: yann(blendswap.com)

Textures:
textures.com
texturemax.com

Music:
